Articles.Content:
After not finding/seeing one, I took it upon myself to have a crack at it. Plus, this is the first rocket I built in .21, and it got to orbit on the first go!

Download link after pics.

Pictures:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download:

http://www./?2o3n54rew4u5npp

NOTES:

The orbit I put it in was around 70km X 125km.

I forgot to get screenshots while staging, but the first and second stages are just as you see in the pics, and the 3rd stage uses a skipper engine, and the space craft has a poodle engine.

I didn't set up any action groups, I leave that up to you.

If anyone has any improvements to make as far as making it more functional/ more like the real thing(better thrust, LES, fairings, etc.), feel free to share!

Have fun with it!
